programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements. From the bombardier beetle's boiling spray to the mantis shrimp's explosive club and the draco lizard‚Äôs hidden wings, meet nature's awesome secret weapons.

programme.title: Jaguar Beach
programme.desc: On a remote stretch of Central America‚Äôs Pacific coast, the lush, volcanic landscape gives way to a startlingly different world: a dry tropical forest. Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkey's Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of nature's ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: With the arrival of spring, animals from all over the South Atlantic are suddenly converging on the Falklands. The striated cara-cara is one of the few year-round inhabitants of the islands.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Each year, monarch butterflies undertake a multi-generational migration from Mexico all the way to Canada and back again. .

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Tigers have the strength of 13 men and their tongue has teeth. Polar bears can regenerate their own bones and may provide a cure for diabetes..

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Raccoons can scale tall objects by changing the shape of their skeletons and the octopus pumps its blood with three hearts..

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: In this dynamic episode, we show how some of the most brutal battles in nature are fought, where size really doesn't matter and there are no guaranteed victories. .

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: 'Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles' reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club

programme.title: Animal Fight Club

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day! Dr. Pol and Dr. Brenda rush to the aid of animals struggling to give birth, while Dr. Lisa treats a cow suffering from a postpartum emergency. Two puppies get poked for their vaccines, and two older dogs come in with quills stuck all over their bodies. As Mothers Day approaches, Doc and Charles cook up a special treat for Diane and Beth. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Get a documentary-style look into the personal lives of our country vets. Its a hectic schedule as Dr. Pol & Dr. Lisa see two dogs at once needing emergency labor. Dr. Brenda tangles with llamas. Baskets of puppies and frisky horses pay a visit to the clinic. See the vets wrangle their own kids, decompress on the lake, and care for their beloved animals. .

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets
programme.desc: The Docs at Critter Fixer see an overweight show rabbit looking to shed some pounds, help to neuter a rescued coyote, examine a dog with a huge growth on its head and treat an abscess on a snake. Dr. Hodges discovers a nasty yeast infection in a dog‚Äôs ear, treats a chicken with a mystery wound and performs one of the most difficult endoscopies he‚Äôs seen to save a dog‚Äôs life.

programme.title: Heartland Docs, DVM
programme.desc: Dr. Erin gets a crash course on showing steer from a budding farmer before competing at the State Fair. At the clinic, Dr. Ben performs cryotherapy on a Vizsla with skin cancer while Dr. Erin helps a three-legged cat with kittens on the way. Together, the docs save a horse with a life-threatening injury. Out on the farm, sparks fly when Dr. Ben rescues a heifer who has her head stuck in a gate.
